author: jennyhunter-msft
body:
## Steps to reproduce

Run Add-AzureRmAccount with the credential parameter. Also repeatable with Login-AzureRmAccount
e.g. Add-AzureRmAccount -Credential $Credential -Tenant 'xxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxx' -ServicePrincipal
## Expected behavior

```
Add-AzureRmAccount -Credential $credential -TenantId $tenant -ServicePrincipal

Environment           : AzureCloud
Account               :  xxxxx-xxxxx-xxxx-xxxx
TenantId              : xxxxx-xxxxx-xxxx-xxxx
SubscriptionId        : xxxxx-xxxxx-xxxx-xxxx
SubscriptionName      : Subscription Name
CurrentStorageAccount : 

```
## Actual behavior

```
Add-AzureRmAccount : A parameter cannot be found that matches parameter name 'Credential'.
At ./Azure-Demo.ps1:22 char:20
+ Add-AzureRmAccount -Credential $credential -TenantId $tenant -Service ...
+                    ~~~~~~~~~~~
    + CategoryInfo          : InvalidArgument: (:) [Add-AzureRmAccount], ParameterBindingException
    + FullyQualifiedErrorId : NamedParameterNotFound,Microsoft.Azure.Commands.Profile.AddAzureRMAccountCommand
```
## Environment data

Ubuntu 14.0.4

```

Name                           Value
----                           -----
PSVersion                      6.0.0-alpha
PSEdition                      Core
PSCompatibleVersions           {1.0, 2.0, 3.0, 4.0...}
BuildVersion                   3.0.0.0
GitCommitId                    v6.0.0-alpha.9
CLRVersion
WSManStackVersion              3.0
PSRemotingProtocolVersion      2.3
SerializationVersion           1.1.0.1

```
